title: Past Tense Introduction
content:
# Introduction to Past Tense (Pretérito Perfecto)

## Formation
- haber (present) + participle
- Regular participles: -ado, -ido
- Common irregular participles

## Time Expressions
- hoy - today
- esta semana - this week
- este mes - this month
- ya - already
- nunca - never

## Practice Exercises
1. Form regular participles
2. Use haber in present tense
3. Create sentences about recent experiences

title: Making Plans
content:
# Future Plans and Arrangements

## Expressions
- ir + a + infinitive
- pensar + infinitive
- querer + infinitive
- necesitar + infinitive

## Time Expressions
- mañana - tomorrow
- la próxima semana - next week
- el mes que viene - next month
- este fin de semana - this weekend

## Practice Exercises
1. Talk about future plans
2. Arrange meetings and appointments
3. Express intentions and desires

title: Complex Opinions
content:
# Expressing Complex Opinions

## Opinion Structures
- creer que - to believe that
- pensar que - to think that
- me parece que - it seems to me that
- en mi opinión - in my opinion

## Connecting Words
- porque - because
- pero - but
- sin embargo - however
- además - furthermore

## Practice Exercises
1. Express and justify opinions
2. Agree and disagree with others
3. Write a short argumentative text
